events.message: Customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of May 1st involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection.
After initial review, the claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to the involvement of a car collision on public road.
An experienced claims agent was assigned to the case to facilitate prompt communication and documentation for the vehicle accident.
Acknowledgment of the claim was sent to the customer, confirming receipt of the auto accident notice and next steps.
Request made for repair estimates, police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and driver statements to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report, images of the vehicle damage, and contact information of the other party.
A claims investigator was assigned to review submitted documents and verify details about the collision for claim validity.
Investigation concluded after interview with involved parties and review of vehicle repair estimates confirming coverage eligibility.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer covering repair costs and related expenses per policy terms.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing appreciation for timely handling and fair evaluation.
Approval granted for settlement payment, confirming the claim meets all the policy requirements without discrepancies.
Payment for the agreed settlement amount was issued to the customerâ€™s account for repair and other vehicle-related expenses.
The claim was formally closed following payment issuance, with confirmation sent to the customer about completion of the case.
All claim files and communications were archived securely in compliance with record retention policies for future reference.
